episode.description: This program presents bento ideas sent in from around the world. Learn how to give leftovers a bento makeover and use shared ingredients to make different bento for your family.
episode.subtitle: Season 1-1 Omugiri & Kara-age
episode.title: BENTO EXPO

episode.description: BENTO EXPO covers the healthy, appetizing and economical world of bento! Marc Matsumoto makes a delicious sandwich bento with leftover meatloaf and Maki shares her favorite tamagoyaki recipes.
episode.subtitle: Season 1-2 Meatloaf Sandwich & Tamagoyaki
episode.title: BENTO EXPO

episode.description: On this episode, Marc and Maki introduce 2 popular teriyaki-style bento: a healthy teriyaki maitake mushroom bento and a delicious teriyaki chicken with teriyaki-style fried egg bento.
episode.subtitle: Season 2-1 Teriyaki Maitake & "Oyako" Teriyaki
episode.title: BENTO EXPO

episode.description: Marc introduces a nutritious miso-flavored ground pork bento that goes along wonderfully with vegetables. Maki uses oily and delicious mackerel to make a grilled fish and rice bento.
episode.subtitle: Season 2-2 Vegetable Garden with Niku Miso & Mixed Rice with Mackerel
episode.title: BENTO EXPO

episode.description: Maki shows us how to make a bento using the ever-popular ginger pork. Marc demonstrates how to make a simple and healthy yakisoba bento. We head to Iwakuni, Yamaguchi Prefecture during Bento Trip.
episode.subtitle: Season 2-3 Shirataki Yakisoba & Shogayaki
episode.title: BENTO EXPO

episode.description: Marc shows us how to make a colorful bento to eat during hanami, cherry blossom viewing. Maki uses a variety of delicious ingredients to make an easy spring roll bento.
episode.subtitle: Season 2-4 Hanami Bento & Fun Rolls
episode.title: BENTO EXPO
